proposal: Ever wondered if your AI girlfriend could manage a DEX or run a lottery? With Soulful AI Girlfriend, you're already on a unique journey, and we're here to add a twist. Imagine integrating our B2B tools to let your community deploy their own DEX or lottery, making the connection even more rewarding. Congrats on reaching 131 holders on the ETH network! Let's explore how we can blend our tools with your vision, creating a space where love meets DeFi.
